name: query_uniprot
description: Query the UniProt REST API using either natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about proteins (e.g., "Find information about human insulin")

endpoint.description: Full or partial UniProt API endpoint URL to query directly (e.g., "https://rest.uniprot.org/uniprotkb/P01308")

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

name: query_alphafold
description: Query the AlphaFold Database API for protein structure predictions.

endpoint.description: Specific AlphaFold API endpoint to query: "prediction", "summary", or "annotations"

file_format.description: Format of the structure file to download - "pdb" or "cif"

model_number.description: Model number (1-5, with 1 being the highest confidence model)

name: query_interpro
description: Query the InterPro REST API using natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about protein domains or families

endpoint.description: Direct endpoint path or full URL (e.g., '/entry/interpro/IPR023411')

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return per page

name: query_pdb
description: Query the RCSB PDB database using natural language or a direct structured query.

prompt.description: Natural language query about protein structures

query.description: Direct structured query in RCSB Search API format (overrides prompt)

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

name: query_pdb_identifiers
description: Retrieve detailed data and/or download files for PDB identifiers.

identifiers.description: List of PDB identifiers to query

download.description: Whether to download PDB structure files

attributes.description: List of specific attributes to retrieve

name: query_stringdb
description: Query the STRING protein interaction database using natural language or direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about protein interactions

endpoint.description: Full URL to query directly (overrides prompt)

download_image.description: Whether to download image results (for image endpoints)

verbose.description: Whether to return detailed response information

name: query_paleobiology
description: Query the Paleobiology Database (PBDB) API using natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about fossil records

endpoint.description: API endpoint name or full URL

verbose.description: Whether to return detailed query information

name: query_jaspar
description: Query the JASPAR REST API using natural language or a direct endpoint to retrieve transcription factor binding profiles.

prompt.description: Natural language query about transcription factor binding profiles

endpoint.description: API endpoint path (e.g., '/matrix/MA0002.2/') or full URL

verbose.description: Whether to return detailed query information

name: query_worms
description: Query the World Register of Marine Species (WoRMS) REST API using natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about marine species

endpoint.description: Full URL or endpoint specification

verbose.description: Whether to return full API response details

name: query_cbioportal
description: Query the cBioPortal REST API using natural language or a direct endpoint to access cancer genomics data.

prompt.description: Natural language query about cancer genomics data

endpoint.description: API endpoint path (e.g., '/studies/brca_tcga/patients') or full URL

verbose.description: Whether to return detailed API response information

name: query_clinvar
description: Take a natural language prompt and convert it to a structured ClinVar query.

prompt.description: Natural language query about genetic variants (e.g., "Find pathogenic BRCA1 variants")

search_term.description: Direct search term to use with the ClinVar API

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

name: query_geo
description: Query the NCBI Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) using natural language or a direct search term.

prompt.description: Natural language query about RNA-seq, microarray, or other expression data

search_term.description: Direct search term in GEO syntax

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

name: query_dbsnp
description: Query the NCBI dbSNP database using natural language or a direct search term.

prompt.description: Natural language query about genetic variants/SNPs

search_term.description: Direct search term in dbSNP syntax

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

name: query_ucsc
description: Query the UCSC Genome Browser API using natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about genomic data

endpoint.description: Full URL or endpoint specification with parameters

name: query_ensembl
description: Query the Ensembl REST API using natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about genomic data

endpoint.description: Direct API endpoint to query (e.g., "lookup/symbol/human/BRCA2") or full URL

name: query_opentarget
description: Query the OpenTargets Platform API using natural language or a direct GraphQL query.

prompt.description: Natural language query about drug targets, diseases, and mechanisms

name: query_monarch
description: Query the Monarch Initiative API using natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about genetic variants

endpoint.description: Direct API endpoint to query

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

name: query_openfda
description: Query the OpenFDA database for drug, device, and food safety information

prompt.description: Natural language query about FDA-regulated products

endpoint.description: Optional direct OpenFDA API endpoint

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

name: query_clinicaltrials
description: Query ClinicalTrials.gov for studies using natural language, direct endpoint, or structured parameters.

prompt.description: Natural language query about clinical trials (if no endpoint/params provided)

endpoint.description: Direct API path or full URL to ClinicalTrials.gov endpoint

status.description: Overall recruitment status filter, e.g., RECRUITING

phase.description: Trial phase filter (e.g., PHASE1, PHASE2, PHASE3)

max_pages.description: Max pages to fetch for pagination

verbose.description: Whether to return detailed response structure

name: query_gwas_catalog
description: Query the GWAS Catalog API using natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about GWAS data

endpoint.description: Full API endpoint to query (e.g., "https://www.ebi.ac.uk/gwas/rest/api/studies?diseaseTraitId=EFO_0001360")

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

name: query_gnomad
description: Query gnomAD for variants in a gene using natural language or direct gene symbol.

prompt.description: Natural language query about genetic variants

verbose.description: Whether to return detailed query results

name: query_reactome
description: Query the Reactome database using natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about biological pathways

endpoint.description: Direct API endpoint or full URL

name: query_regulomedb
description: Query the RegulomeDB database using natural language or direct variant/coordinate specification.

prompt.description: Natural language query about regulatory elements

endpoint.description: Direct API endpoint to query

name: query_pride
description: Query the PRIDE (PRoteomics IDEntifications) database using natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about proteomics data

endpoint.description: The full endpoint to query (e.g., "https://www.ebi.ac.uk/pride/ws/archive/v2/projects?keyword=breast%20cancer")

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return

name: query_gtopdb
description: Query the Guide to PHARMACOLOGY database (GtoPdb) using natural language or a direct endpoint.

prompt.description: Natural language query about drug targets, ligands, and interactions

endpoint.description: Full API endpoint to query (e.g., "https://www.guidetopharmacology.org/services/targets?type=GPCR&name=beta-2")

name: query_mpd
description: Query the Mouse Phenome Database (MPD) for mouse strain phenotype data using natural language or direct endpoint access.

prompt.description: Natural language query about mouse phenotypes, strains, or measurements

endpoint.description: Full API endpoint to query (e.g., 'https://phenomedoc.jax.org/MPD_API/strains')

name: query_emdb
description: Query the Electron Microscopy Data Bank (EMDB) for 3D macromolecular structures.

prompt.description: Natural language query about EM structures and associated data

endpoint.description: Full API endpoint to query (e.g., "https://www.ebi.ac.uk/emdb/api/search")

name: query_synapse
description: Query Synapse REST API for biomedical datasets and files using natural language or structured search parameters. Supports optional authentication via SYNAPSE_AUTH_TOKEN environment variable. Results include 'access_restricted' property - if true, dataset requires approval via Synapse web interface and cannot be immediately accessed.

prompt.description: Natural language query about biomedical data (e.g., 'Find drug screening datasets')

query_term.description: Specific search terms for Synapse search

max_results.description: Maximum number of results to return. Default 20 is optimal for most searches. Use up to 50 if extensive results are desired for comprehensive analysis.

query_type.description: Type of entity to search for (file, project, folder, etc.)

verbose.description: Whether to return full API response or formatted results
